name: Securing the open source supply chain with Feross Aboukhadijeh on the launch of Socket (The Changelog #482)
summary: This week we’re joined by the “mad scientist” himself, Feross Aboukhadijeh…and we’re talking about the launch of Socket — the next big thing in the fight to secure and protect the open source supply chain. While working on the frontlines of open source, Feross and team have witnessed firsthand how supply chain attacks ...
